title: Something wicked this way comes
creator_credit: Jack Clayton, Peter Vincent Douglas and Walt Disney
brief_description: A stranger known as Mr. Dark brings his evil travelling carnival to a small town and the task of saving family and friends from its destructive clutches falls upon a boy and his father, the town librarian. Based on Ray Bradbury’s novel of the same name. Cast includes Jason Robards, Jonathan Pryce, Diane Ladd, Pam Grier, Vidal Peterson.
